dict.acceptation: 连衣裙的；须穿礼服的；适合于正式场合的；办公时（或半正式场合）穿戴的；
给…穿衣；给…提供衣服；装潢，装饰或装点；排成列；

sent.orig: We offer dress& gown, cocktail dress, party dress, casual dressdress, club dress and so on.
sent.trans: 我们提供晚礼服，（正式场合穿的）短裙，宴会礼服，休闲服，家庭装，俱乐部装等等。

sent.orig: Our main products include high-grade evening dress, flower girl dress and top-grade fashionable dress.
sent.trans: 主要的产品系列有高级晚装、花童礼服、高档时装。

sent.orig: Tina bought a new dress yesterday, and the dress has a style as dead a dodo.
sent.trans: 蒂娜昨天买了一件新衣服，不过衣服的款式已经过时了。

sent.orig: Children are influenced by their peers beginning at an early age to dress as others dress.
sent.trans: 儿童在幼小时会受到同龄儿童的影响，他们开始按照他人的方式打扮自己。

sent.orig: Caption: The Porcelain Dress: Designed by stylist Li Xiaofeng, this dress was entirely made out porcelain.
sent.trans: 描述：瓷器做的服装：由服装设计师李晓峰设计，完全由碎瓷片做成。
